remarks: The closure of a subset of a topological space is the subset together with its limit points.  Theorem 6.6 of [Munkres] p. 97.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
statement:
lpfval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
clslp $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = ( S u. ( ( limPt ` J ) ` S ) ) ) $.
